column5: Just bought 2. Are their any artificial baits that can be used (hair jigs maybe? How would you impart any action? Bring on the ice!
Illegal in Ontario (i think).  Where'd you buy them?
I mean illegal to use in Ontario.  Not possess.
Lets not do this again... lol.. Cabelas I bet.
oh boy here we go again ...
Enjoy them if you have them!! Make sure you let us know how they work.
They are legal. The bend of the rod provides hookset, NOT a spring.
They are legal. The bend of the rod provides hookset, NOT a spring.   YUP  Lock it now.
they are made for live bait,, you can't even really jig your line in it but hair jigs and minnow imitators and tubes will catch fish just sitting  there
Sorry Mr. Topwater..  I thought they were illegal.  Looks like I'm wrong!
Bought a couple last year.  Seem to work pretty well for me.  Ran live bait on them.
